snippet: The new exhibition at the Jewish Museum examines network television’s knowing if informal relationship with the high art of the time.
abstract: Mike Hale reviews exhibition Revolution of the Eye: Modern Art and the Birth of American Television at Jewish Museum.
lead_paragraph: The new exhibition at the Jewish Museum examines network television’s knowing if informal relationship with the high art of the time.

headline.main: Review: ‘Revolution of the Eye’ Examines Art’s Influence on Early TV
headline.print_headline: When TV Took Notes in Art Class
